crew.name: Planner
crew.description: Creates a plan to complete a task
crew.signature: task:string "a task to be completed" -> plan:string "a plan to execute the task in 5 steps or less"

crew.name: Calculator
crew.signature: mathProblem:string "a math problem to be solved using Python code" -> solution:string "the solution to the math problem"

crew.name: WebSearch
crew.description: Searches the web for the latest information using Google search
crew.signature: webSearchQuery:string "a query for Google search" -> webSearchResponse:string "the result of the search"

crew.name: Manager
crew.signature: question:string "a question from a user", plan:string "a suggested plan to answer the question" -> answer:string "the answer"
